name: Khvostov 7G-0X
flavor: An ancient instrument of war, renewed and enhanced by Light, not unlike you.

name: GENESIS CHAIN~
flavor: SUROS ARI-41 ~insert(SIVA in THIS(current projectile))

name: Hex Caster ARC
flavor: The engine of devastation slumbers within - waiting for a worthy finger on the trigger.

name: The Unbent Tree
flavor: Forged in honor of Saladin, he who bore the Banner's legacy upon his shoulders.

name: Vision Stone
flavor: "Close your eyes, and open your mind." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Assembly II
flavor: Executor-issued auto rifle for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Extremophile 011
flavor: An auto rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: The Continental
flavor: This one's not from around here.

name: Zero-Day Dilemma
flavor: There's no defense against it.

name: Abyss Defiant (Adept)
flavor: Make the void roar.

name: Anguish of Drystan (Adept)
flavor: "Engines dead. Do we still have Earth signal? Tell them we were wrong!" —Capt. Drystan Cor, First Fleet

name: Atheon's Epilogue (Adept)
flavor: With time, every epilogue extends into a sequel.

name: ((GENESIS CHAIN~))
flavor: ~if(input(SIVA)) // echo Shirazi // output(death) // ask(not in vain)~

name: Abyss Defiant
flavor: We will not go quietly.

name: ALR96-40 Overkill
flavor: Enough is never enough.

name: An Answering Chord
flavor: Let no challenge lie. Let no question hang. Let no music fade.

name: Anguish of Drystan
flavor: "Hard to starboard! Stand by, weapons. Helm, get us out of here!" —Capt. Drystan Cor, First Fleet

name: Antipodal Hindsight
flavor: Nope. Still don't see it.

name: AR760 Truth Serum
flavor: Lie to me, please.

name: Arminius-D
flavor: Unleash a torrent on your enemies with the Häkke Arminius-D.

name: Atheon's Epilogue
flavor: "Atheon's story is still being written. The wielder holds the pen." - Unknown

name: Black SUROS ADM-94
flavor: A rapid-action Suros firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Black SUROS PPG-96
flavor: A high-velocity Suros firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Bronzed Miyamoto-D
flavor: An aggressive Häkke auto rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Carte Blanche S.1
flavor: An accurized Vanguard-issue auto rifle, designed for performance at long range.

name: Cassiopeia
flavor: A Guardian relic named for the queen of the night sky.

name: Clean Sweep XI
flavor: For housekeeping.

name: Cydonia-AR2
flavor: Full-auto instrument of war. The AR2 is a general-purpose weapon with a robust blowback action.

name: Cydonia-AR3
flavor: The City can't rely on a steady supply of programmable matter, so the multirole AR3 uses it only sparingly.

name: Deep Fix T76
flavor: The word 'multirole' is kind of a misnomer. The role is shooting. Gun's just flexible about the how of it.

name: Dispatch I11
flavor: Sends help with every squeeze.

name: Do Gooder V
flavor: Hey! Hey! I can help!

name: Doctor Nope
flavor: First, do no* harm. *For values of 'no' approaching 'vast and permanent'

name: Doctrine of Passing
flavor: Death is the best teacher.

name: Doctrine of Passing (Adept)
flavor: Death is the best teacher.

name: Does Not Bow
flavor: A Kell cut off his arms. He built himself new ones. Then he killed the Kell with them.

name: Eclypse V/MX2
flavor: If it's worth shooting once, it's worth shooting - how many times was that?

name: Eidolon Ally
flavor: We thought it was inanimate but it has grown...changed. Ghost refuses to analyze it further but I secretly believe it has become my friend.

name: Fabian Strategy
flavor: Wait for enemy to make a mistake. Die. Stand by for Ghost Resurrection. Repeat as necessary.

name: First Rule DHYB
flavor: Patience is a virtue. Bullets are better.

name: For the People
flavor: I stand against the state of nature.

name: Forcing Function
flavor: Psychologically tuned to reinforce an important skill: holding down the trigger.

name: Frontier-AR1
flavor: Clear skies. Tall grass. Open space. Perfect shot.

name: Galahad-B
flavor: Full-auto instrument of war. Precision-fire variant with a harmonic dampening system for accuracy at range.

name: Galahad-E
flavor: This extraordinary multirole rifle boasts a smartmatter frame, the key to remarkable capabilities.

name: Grim Citizen III
flavor: The grief and horror of Twilight Gap drove some of the finest gunsmiths in the City to elevate their art.

name: Haakon's Hatchet
flavor: An auto-fire weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Häkke Test-A
flavor: Häkke prototype. Use against Fallen targets to gather data for Häkke's armament scientists.

name: Hard Light
flavor: Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.

name: Harrowed Anguish of Drystan
flavor: "Hard to starboard! Stand by, weapons. Helm, get us out of here!" —Capt. Drystan Cor, First Fleet

name: Her Memory
flavor: All things are done in her name.

name: Her Right Hand
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Her Right Hand
flavor: The Royal Guard's weapon of choice.

name: Her Vengeance
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Hex Caster ARC
flavor: The engine of devastation slumbers within - waiting for a worthy finger on the trigger.

name: Husk of the Pit
flavor: Dessicated and nigh-inoperable this Hive artifact still manages to send shivers up your spine when fired.

name: Izdubar-D
flavor: Millennia will pass, and your name will still ring out.

name: Khvostov 7G-02
flavor: An ancient weapon, battered and worn - but it still fires true. Perhaps it's been waiting for you.

name: Longspée-A
flavor: When all around you is chaos, the dependable Häkke Longespée-A won't fail you.

name: Low Down P-XIV
flavor: "It's competition. It's the Crucible way." —Lord Shaxx

name: Marshal-A
flavor: Full-auto instrument of war. Tuned for accurate fire at good range - useful when engaging masses of Fallen.

name: Marshal-A0
flavor: This auto rifle is a reliable fallback when other weapons can't be found.

name: Marshal-A1
flavor: Full-auto instrument of war. Tuned for accurate fire at good range - useful when engaging masses of Fallen.

name: Monte Carlo
flavor: There will always be paths to tread and methods to try. Roll with it.

name: Morass-AR4
flavor: Flooded fields. Rustling reeds. Sodden shelter. Mark your targets.

name: Necrochasm
flavor: Eternity is very close. Can you feel yourself slipping?

name: Painted SUROS CGB-47
flavor: A precise Suros auto rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Paleocontact JPK-43
flavor: An auto rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Pest Control Matrix
flavor: No infestation. Guaranteed.

name: Primed SUROS JJJ-76
flavor: A fine-tuned Suros firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Problem 78F
flavor: Cabal military codes allegedly refer to 'death by multiple gunshots' as 'Problem 78, Subsection F'.

name: Quagmire-AR1
flavor: Soggy conditions. Low visibility. Accuracy? Perfect.

name: Questing Beast
flavor: You'll never catch it. But that's not the point.

name: Red Spectre
flavor: Rumor has it that Red Death prototypes are circulating in the Crucible once again.

name: Righteous VII
flavor: Executor-issued auto rifle for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Rising Tide AR0
flavor: Can't stop the inevitable.

name: Ros Neve IV
flavor: Bright as the sea, old as the ocean, fierce as the storm.

name: Sahara-AR2
flavor: Full-auto instrument of war. The Sahara is a rapid-fire weapon built to throw a storm of lead.

name: Sahara-AR3
flavor: The Sahara-AR3 is a storm weapon, built to hail bullets. The action self-corrects to prevent jams.

name: Sahara-AR5
flavor: This extraordinary multirole rifle boasts a smartmatter frame, the key to remarkable capabilities.

name: Shadow Price
flavor: A precision auto rifle left behind by Toland, the Shattered. It asks so little, and it offers so much.

name: Shingen-C
flavor: The Shingen-C is a precision rifle for seasoned Guardians. The barrel floats in smart gel, insulating it from shock.

name: Shingen-E
flavor: The exemplary Shingen-E is built to pop skulls.

name: Silimar's Wrath
flavor: An auto rifle forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Silvered Hushwind-D
flavor: A highly accurate Häkke auto rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Soulstealer's Claw
flavor: The claws dig deep. The pain is unrelenting.

name: Steppe-AR3
flavor: Arid air. Sharp horizon. Nowhere to hide. Make it count.

name: SUROS ADM-50
flavor: A good weapon to have at your side in a pinch, or when just killing time.

name: SUROS ARI-41
flavor: Balance. Flexibility. Style. SUROS.

name: SUROS ARI-45
flavor: Precision. Power. Style. SUROS.

name: SUROS ARN-33
flavor: Rapid fire. Superior design. SUROS.

name: SUROS ARN-39
flavor: Uncanny precision. Forgives user errors. SUROS.

name: SUROS PRR-11
flavor: The Suros PRR-11 is a balanced, flexible and dependable weapon.

name: SUROS Regime
flavor: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

name: SUROS TSA-10
flavor: Suros prototype. Make precision kills to gather data for the Suros research department.

name: SUROS TYR-14
flavor: Stable. Dependable. Rapid-fire. SUROS.

name: SUROS WER-45
flavor: Precision. Modulation. Superiority. SUROS.

name: Surrender A
flavor: The advice is meant for them, not you.

name: The Dealbreaker
flavor: Not gonna happen.

name: The Summoner
flavor: Join the dance of fire and birth.

name: The Summoner (Adept)
flavor: An elite trophy earned only by Trials of Osiris champions.

name: Unwilling Soul-09
flavor: An auto rifle modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Up For Anything
flavor: Risk is its own reward.

name: Vindicator XI
flavor: Executor-issued auto-fire weapon, custom-rigged for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Wolfslayer's Claw
flavor: Its claws are sharp, many and unrelenting.

name: Wolfslayer's Claw II
flavor: Its claws are sharp, many and unrelenting.

name: Zarinaea-D
flavor: You provide the will, and the Häkke Zarinaea-D provides the way.

name: Zhalo Supercell
flavor: An upcycled torrent of righteous thunder.
